member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore
member.summary: Core utility class for accessing V Rising game systems and components. Provides centralized access to EntityManager, Server, and other game systems. Updated to match working ICB.core pattern for proper V Rising 1.1+ compatibility.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize VRisingCore with proper world detection

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.ServerWorld
member.summary: Gets the V Rising Server World using the working ICB.core pattern

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.EntityManager
member.summary: Gets the EntityManager for the current world using working pattern.

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.ServerGameManager
member.summary: Gets the ServerGameManager for spawning items and managing game state.

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.Server
member.summary: Gets the main Server system.

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.Log
member.summary: Gets the current log source for logging messages.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.InitializeServerGameManager
member.summary: Initialize the ServerGameManager from the server systems.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.Reinitialize
member.summary: Force reinitialize all systems (useful after world changes).

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.IsReady
member.summary: Check if all required systems are available.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.VRisingCore.ValidateEntity(Unity.Entities.Entity,Unity.Entities.ComponentType[])
member.summary: Validate that an entity exists and has the required components.

member.summary: Indicates whether the core services have been initialized.

member.summary: Event triggered after core initialization completes. Subscribe to this to perform custom setup after services are available.

member.summary: Gets information about the current initialization state.

member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts
member.summary: Complete loadout configurations for CrowbaneArena. These provide balanced sets of weapons, armor, and consumables for PvP matches.

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.Warrior
member.summary: Loadout 1: Warrior Build - Balanced tank/attacker with Chaos enhancements Weapon: Storm-enchanted Greatsword for strong melee damage Armor: Full Dracula Warrior set for survivability Consumables: Mix of healing and empowerment potions

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.Assassin
member.summary: Loadout 2: Assassin Build - High mobility and glass cannon damage Weapon: Illusion-enchanted Daggers for stealth and speed Armor: Dracula Rogue set for mobility and utilities Consumables: Speed and damage-focused potions

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.Mage
member.summary: Loadout 3: Mage Build - High magical damage with area control Weapon: Frost-enchanted Spear for spell power and utility Armor: Dracula Scholar set for magical enhancements Consumables: Mana and resistance potions

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.Brute
member.summary: Loadout 4: Brute Build - Pure tank with devastating close-range attacks Weapon: Unholy-enchanted Mace for movement speed and survivability Armor: Dracula Brute set for maximum defense Consumables: Survivability and burst damage potions

member.name: P:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.All
member.summary: Gets all loadouts as a list.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.GetByNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a loadout by build number (1-4).
member.param: Build number (1=Warrior, 2=Assassin, 3=Mage, 4=Brute).
member.returns: The corresponding loadout config, or null if invalid number.

member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.Data.Loadouts.LoadoutConfig
member.summary: Loadout configuration class for PvP setups.

member.returns: True if the consumable was found.

member.summary: Attempts to find a spell/ability prefab by name.

The PrefabGUID if found.
member.returns: True if the spell was found.

member.summary: Attempts to find a unit/mob prefab by name.
member.param: The unit name to search for.
The PrefabGUID if found.
member.returns: True if the unit was found.

member.summary: Attempts to find an armor piece by set name and slot.
member.param: The armor set name (warrior, rogue, scholar, brute).
The slot name (chest, legs, boots, gloves).
The PrefabGUID if found.
member.returns: True if the armor piece was found.

member.summary: Gets a complete armor set by name.

member.summary: Gets all items in a specific category as a formatted list.

member.returns: Formatted string list of items.

member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleHeartService
member.summary: Service for managing and querying castle heart entities in the arena. Supports dynamic creation of castle hearts anywhere on the map.

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleHeartService.CastleHeartQuery
member.summary: Query for filtering castle heart entities.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleHeartService.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CastleHeartService class. Sets up the entity query for castle hearts with required components.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleHeartService.TryGetByID(ProjectM.Network.NetworkId,Unity.Entities.Entity@)
member.summary: Attempts to find a castle heart entity by its network ID.
member.param: The network ID of the castle to find.
When this method returns, contains the castle entity if found; otherwise, Entity.Null.
member.returns: True if the castle was found; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleHeartService.TryGetByOwnerUser(ProjectM.Network.User,Unity.Entities.Entity@)
member.summary: Attempts to find a castle heart entity owned by a specific user.
member.param: The user whose castle heart should be found.
When this method returns, contains the castle entity if found; otherwise, Entity.Null.
member.returns: True if the castle was found; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleHeartService.CreateCastleHeart(Unity.Mathematics.float3,Unity.Entities.Entity,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new castle heart entity at the specified position. This method allows building castle hearts anywhere on the map for arena purposes. Note: Implementation requires additional VRising component definitions.
member.param: The position where to create the castle heart.
The owning user entity.
The team the castle belongs to.
The territory index to assign.
member.returns: The created castle heart entity.

member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleTerritoryService
member.summary: Service for managing castle territory-related (plot) operations and queries. Supports creating new territories for arena battles.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleTerritoryService.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CastleTerritoryService class. Loads and maps all castle territories and their blocks.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleTerritoryService.TryGetCastleTerritory(Unity.Entities.Entity,Unity.Entities.Entity@)
member.summary: Attempts to get the castle territory entity for a given entity based on its position.
member.param: The entity to check.
The output territory entity if found.
member.returns: True if a territory was found for the entity, false otherwise.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleTerritoryService.GetTerritoryIndex(Unity.Mathematics.float3)
member.summary: Gets the territory index for a given position.
member.param: The position to check.
member.returns: The territory index if found, -1 otherwise.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleTerritoryService.GetHeartForTerritory(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the castle heart entity for a given territory index.
member.param: The territory index to search for.
member.returns: The castle heart entity if found, Entity.Null otherwise.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Services.CastleTerritoryService.CreateCastleTerritory(Unity.Mathematics.float3,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new castle territory at the specified position for arena battles.
member.param: The center position of the new territory.
The size of the territory in blocks (radius).
The territory index to assign (auto-generated if -1).
member.returns: The created castle territory entity.

member.summary: Defines the state of a player's progress in the arena/reset system.

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Services.PlayerProgressState.PendingArenaKick
member.summary: Player has been reset and needs to be kicked on next join to start the arena flow.

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Services.PlayerProgressState.PendingArenaSpawn
member.summary: Player has been kicked once and now needs to be spawned in the arena on next join.

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Services.PlayerProgressState.InArena
member.summary: Player is currently active in the arena with reset progress.

member.name: F:CrowbaneArena.Services.PlayerProgressState.PendingRestoreKick
member.summary: Player has exited the arena and needs to be kicked to restore their original progress.

member.name: T:CrowbaneArena.Services.ProgressManagerService
member.summary: Manages the full lifecycle of a player's progress: resetting for the arena and restoring it upon exit. This service archives a player's original character bind and tracks their state through the process.

member.summary: Archives a player's progress and begins the reset-to-arena process.

member.summary: Begins the progress restoration process for a player exiting the arena.

member.name: M:CrowbaneArena.Services.ProgressManagerService.RestorePlayerProgress(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Restores a player's original progress by re-binding their archived character name.
member.returns: True if progress was successfully restored.

member.summary: Advances a player to the next state in the process.
